name: Super Quantal Alphancall Appeal
text: If a "Super Quant" monster you control is destroyed by battle: Special Summon 1 "Super Quantal Mech Beast" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck, then you can Special Summon 1 "Super Quantum" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY, that is specifically listed on that Xyz Monster in its text, but negate its effects. You can only activate 1 "Super Quantal Alphancall Appeal" per turn.
